{"id":771314761,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1660243735,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"122 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/771314761/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Delete Operation for Two Strings","memory":"7.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int dp[501][501];\n    int solve(string &x,string &y,int n,int m){\n        if(n==0 || m==0) dp[n][m]=0;\n        if(dp[n][m]!=-1) return dp[n][m];\n        else if(x[n-1]==y[m-1]) dp[n][m]=1+solve(x,y,n-1,m-1);\n        else{\n           dp[n][m]=max(solve(x,y,n-1,m),solve(x,y,n,m-1));\n        }\n        return dp[n][m];\n    }\n    int solve2(string x,string y,int n,int m){\n        return n+m-2*solve(x,y,n,m);\n    }\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));\n        return solve2(word1,word2,word1.length(),word2.length());\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"delete-operation-for-two-strings","has_notes":false}
